text: Andrés Bello Catholic University, also known in Spanish as Universidad Católica Andrés Bello (UCAB), is a private university with main campus located in Caracas, Venezuela. One of the largest universities in Venezuela and it was established in 1953 by the Society of Jesus. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Colleges and universities in South America Category:Caracas Category:1953 establishments in South America Category:20th-century establishments in Venezuela Category:Organizations based in Venezuela
title: Andrés Bello Catholic University
